title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for limits

1 point is earned for answer

f(x)=4 ⇒ x=0, 2.3

Volume = π ∫ 0 2.3 [(4+2)2-(f(x)+2)2]dx

= 98.868 (or 98.867)
